EditTextPreference.android:title: Good GPS fix number
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Number of consecutive good GPS fixes required before GPS status is considered good. Default: 10

EditTextPreference.android:title: Accuracy threshold (m)
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Minimum accuracy required for a good fix. Default: 40

EditTextPreference.android:title: Towing speed threshold (m/s)
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The speed at which towing is assumed to begin. Default: 8

EditTextPreference.android:title: Altitude increments
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Distance between each step in altitude. Default: 100

EditTextPreference.android:title: Altitude round up limit (m)
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Distance above each 100m before rounding up instead of down. Default: 35
